title: Death Stranding Director’s Cut Details - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.09.21
description:
Yes, your PS4 save works. Yes, there's a paid upgrade path, Yes, you're getting the Half Life and Cyberpunk content. Let's talk about Death Stranding Director's Cut, Sifu, and PlayStation's State of Play with Patrick Shanley! 

Follow Patrick: https://twitter.com/pshanley88

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:00 - Housekeeping
We’ve announced the new studio debut date! Check out the video EVERYWHERE.
BLACK WIDOW IN REVIEW TODAY!
Phil Spencer is coming to the Kinda Funny Gamescast next Tuesday! Get questions in on Patreon.com/kindafunnygames
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:08:40 - Death Stranding Director’s Cut DEETS, Jay Boor @ the PlayStation Blog00
00:20:40 - Sifu Delayed
00:29:30 - Speaking of DS and Sifu, let’s talk PlayStation State of Play in General
00:37:43 -  Ad
00:39:35 - Was all the disappointment fan-caused?  - Best Friends Q:The Nano Biologist
00:45:18 - Genshin Impact to Add New City, Cross-Save and More This Month, Liam Wiseman @ IGN
00:49:15 - Breaking: @geoffkeighley THE WITCHER Season 2 will come to Netflix on December 17 2021
00:50:10 - Out today
00:54:03 - Squad Up:Eli(PS4/PS5)  - Shawdawgy
00:55:30 - You‘re Wrong
Next Weeks Hosts:
MON: Janet and Tim
TUES: Greg and Gary
WED: Blessing and Andy
THURS: Greg and Tim at a special time -- Noon!
FRI: Greg and Blessing
